'''''Mythlore'' 46''' ([https://dc.swosu.edu/mythlore/vol12/iss4/ Volume 12, Issue 4]) is an issue of the ''[[Mythlore]]'' journal, published by the [[Mythopoeic Society]].
==Contents==

====Articles====

* Nyman, Amy. “A Feminist Perspective in Williams’ Novels.”
* Flieger, Verlyn. “Missing Person.”
* King, Don. “The Childlike in George MacDonald and C.S. Lewis.”
* Rich, Calvin and Earl Ingersol. “A Conversation with Stephen R. Donaldson.”
* Hyde, Paul Nolan. “Leaf and Key.”
* Filmer, Kath. “Beware the Nothing: An Allegorical Reading of Ende's The Neverending Story.”
* Lindskoog, Kathryn. “The First Chronicle of Narnia: The Restoring of Names.”
* Bratman, David. “Caliban between the Worlds.”
* Thompson, George H. “Early Review of Books by J.R.R. Tolkien: Part V.”

====Features====

* GoodKnight, Glen. Editor's Notes.
* Christopher, Joe R. An Inklings' Bibliography (29).
* Beach, Sarah. “Mythopoesis: Specific Derivation.”
* Kondratiev, Alexei. “Tales Newly Told.”
* Speth, Lee. “Cavalier Treatment: The Last of Simon Magus.”
* Letters.

====Reviews====

* ''The Song of Middle-Earth.'' David Harvey. Reviewed by Nancy-Lou Patterson.
* ''The Impulse of Fantasy Literature.'' C.N. Manlove. Reviewed by Nancy-Lou Patterson.
* ''C.S. Lewis: The Man and His Achievement.'' John Peters. Reviewed by Nancy-Lou Patterson.
* ''The Black Cauldron.'' Walt Disney Film. Reviewed by Benjamin Urrutia.
* ''The Book of Three.'' Lloyd Alexander. Reviewed by Benjamin Urrutia.
* ''The Black Cauldron.'' Lloyd Alexander. Reviewed by Benjamin Urrutia.
* ''Through the Open Door: A New Look at C.S. Lewis.'' Dabney Adams Hart. Reviewed by Nancy-Lou Patterson.
* ''Drama in the Cathedral: The Canterbury Festival Plays.'' Kenneth W. Pickering. Reviewed by Nancy-Lou Patterson.
